name: CHIP-8 Web Toolchain
description: An interpeter, disassembler, debugger, and compiler toolchain for the CHIP-8 virtual machine. The toolchain was built with Rust and exposed to a web-interface via WebAssembly.

name: rs2
description: A mod for the PS1 game *Spyro 2*. Written in C, the mod hooks original game functionality to add a variety of new features, and can be controlled by an in-game menu. Development required extensive reverse-engineering of the game's functions and data structures with Ghidra.

name: spyro.run
description: An alternative client-side only frontend for *speedrun.com* leaderboards, with more advanced filtering/sorting. A Python script dumps the necessary data via the speedrun.com API, and is rendered by a React frontend. Also includes an online patcher for *rs2*.
